title: Multiple international democracy research groups declare U.S. in democratic crisis
summary: Leading international democracy monitoring organizations including Freedom House, V-Dem Institute, and International IDEA issue coordinated warnings about rapid U.S. democratic deterioration, citing executive overreach, judicial capture, and civic space restrictions.

sources.title: International democracy groups sound alarm on Trump's U.S.
Democracy research groups issue joint warning on U.S.

notes: First time multiple international democracy organizations have issued coordinated warnings about U.S. democratic health
